channel.title: *how to add donators crown/player rights?!*
channel.description: whatare the player rights for a donator? and how do i make the persons donator player rights, correspond with the corrent crown..someone help this is the only bug i am facing ATM..

item.title: *how to add donators crown/player rights?!*
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

Nope all ya need to do is go to characters folder… find the user ya wanted to be donater
simply put the character-donator = 0
to character-donator = 1[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2009, 10:31:38 am[/size][hr]and if ya want a comamnd ingame to make some1 donator jst add this under “unpc”

if(command.startsWith("unpc") && playerRights >= 2){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
under this “}”

[code]if (command.startsWith(“donator”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“HiddenPker”)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
disconnected = true;
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		writeLog(p.playerName, "donators");

donator = 1;
sM(“You have added “+p.playerName+” to the donator list”);
} else {
sM(“The name doesnt exist.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Try entering a name you want to add to the list…”);
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

If this is delta, Just change the Int “Donator” To one…

if(command.equalsIgnorecase("Donor")) {
donator = 1;
sM("GRATS NUB@!@#!@#");
}

@xcvxcv2 wrote:

last post

http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,373303.0.html

and also i was saying pretend you are making the player rights different

1-donator
2-mod
3-admin
4-owner

so when you add the custom icons on you client, the playerights should be 1 for a donator

item.title: *how to add donators crown/player rights?!*
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“xcvxcv2, post:2, topic:282932”]lol we meet again : )

hows the cape?

now to answer your question, you need to make a player rights for a donator 1, mod 2, admin 3, and owner 4

it wont matter about theres no crown for the owner in a regular because you will code your client to show a owner crown for player rights 4.

i think you might be able to make donators have playerismember=1 but that is alot harder to do and my way is alot easier[/quote]

dude can you PM me the cape? i never got it :((( better yet, add my windowslive messenger thingy… drew1sgod@hotmail.com (:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2009, 08:13:55 pm[/size][hr][quote=“xcvxcv2, post:2, topic:282932”]lol we meet again : )

hows the cape?

now to answer your question, you need to make a player rights for a donator 1, mod 2, admin 3, and owner 4

it wont matter about theres no crown for the owner in a regular because you will code your client to show a owner crown for player rights 4.

i think you might be able to make donators have playerismember=1 but that is alot harder to do and my way is alot easier[/quote]

btw i don’t understand…how do u make 1 = donator…1 = mod >.< c0nfu5ed!!!
